person.persName: Phillip Wilson (Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, gun store owner and entrepreneur)

body.p: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, gun store owner and entrepreneur. Maryland native. Married to Fanny Wilson. Father of Cornelia Wilson and Park Wilson. Owner of gun store in Philadelphia in 1860. Founding member of the Hardwick Oil Company in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, in 1864.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Pennsylvania, Philadelphia County, Philadelphia, Ward 15, p. 103; KYR-0001-007-0332.
